articles.description: There are various websites and apps available to check your internet speed, one of the simplest methods is to go to Googles homepage. Google teamed up with Measurement Lab (M-Lab) to create a five-step process for testing your internet connection speed.
articles.content: Is your internet service provider (ISP) providing you with the stated data speed? Is your internet connection sluggish at times? If you responded yes to both questions, the only way to find out is to… [+2638 chars]
